comments: These are also the numbers not of the form x^2+2y^2+3z^2.
references: B. W. Jones, The Arithmetic of Quadratic Forms, Carus Monograph 10, Math. Assoc. America, 1967; Problem 60, p. 204.
L. J. Mordell, A new Waring's problem with squares of linear forms, Quart. J. Math., 1 (1930), 276-288 (see p. 283).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 01 2000
